physical_appearance: "The image shows several items, some of which are lying on a white cloth and others in a brown bag. There are a few black buttons inside the brown bag. Two more are lying on the white cloth. There is a bone-shaped thread roll that has linen thread looped around it. A blue sewing kit lies nearby. The words, ""Needles for Housewives 1943"" and ""Manufactured by Alfred Shrimpton & Sons Ltd.
context_1: a tin of shoe polish and a khaki cloth are present."
